english.segment1: Jesus, Jesus, one touch of Your hand. I am healed and I am whole. Jesus, Jesus, one glimpse of Your face. Brings fire to my soul.
english.segment2: And Jesus, I come, Beholding Your face. I am changed from glory to glory. And now I see, and now I know, One touch of Your life. Brings glory to my soul.
english.segment3: Jesus, Jesus, from darkness to light. My life overflows. Jesus, Jesus, Your mercy and grace. Like a river flowing down
english.segment4: And Jesus, I come, Beholding Your face. I am changed from glory to glory. And now I see, and now I know, One touch of Your life. Brings glory to my soul.
english.segment5: And now I see, and now I know, One touch of Your life. Brings glory to my soul. And now I see, and now I know, One touch of your life. Brings glory to my soul. And now I see, and now I know, One touch of Your life, Brings glory to my soul.
english.segment6: Jesus, Jesus. Jesus, Jesus. Jesus, Jesus. Jesus, Jesus.
